Headline: #79 79th Temporary Westbound Reroute near 79th/Albany
ShortDescription: Westbound 79 79th buses are temporarily rerouted via 79th, Western Terminal, 71st, Kedzie, and 79th, due to street blockage near 79th/Albany.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #79 79th buses are temporarily rerouted via 79th, Western Terminal, 71st, Kedzie, and 79th, due to street blockage near 79th/Albany.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Orange Line Service Delayed at 35th/Archer
ShortDescription: Orange Line trains are standing at 35th/Archer due to police activity. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Orange Line trains are standing at 35th/Archer due to police activity.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
